description:
This course is all about creating a resume that will get you noticed by hiring managers and CEOs. Learn how to THINK the way they do!

You won't just be told what to do, you will learn how to be aware, anticipate and think the way hiring manager's think. The more you can think like a hiring manager, the better you will be able to create a resume that leads to interviews!

5 Resume Templates are included in this course! But more importantly, the lessons on how to think like a CEO are most crucial to your success.

I've directly coached close to 1,000 people on their resume from various industries facing different obstacles (you're over qualified, not enough experience, job hopper, big gaps, no education, etc). My resume advice has received praise from employers and clients. Most unique is that I won't just tell you what to do, but I will teach you to think the way CEOs think so you can truly EMPOWER YOURSELF!
title: How To Make Your Resume Standout
